Description: A local drug dealer. Who knows who he works for....?

PassCommands.CommandText:
Sup....- Hey Dexter! I got whatever it is you need its just gonna cost ya'.... But I bet you got it don't ya you white boys always do....
-Huh? My name is not Dexter.....And have you seen a mirror lately?
You ask the "home boy".
He just laughs high on some new drug.
-You sure you look just like that kid from tv....Anyway what can I get ya my man?
- Look, Im not trying to start any shit but I know you robbed the locker room up at LCU. You took some stuff from a friend of mine and I want it back.
-Naaaa man.... I don't know what the fuck your talking about.....Look I gotta run.
